sentences.sContent: Hardly anyone can escape the influence of commercialization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hardly anyone can escape the influence of commercialization.
sentences.sCn: 几乎没有人能逃脱商品化的影响。

sentences.sContent: Another thing that concerns me is the commercialization of every aspect of our lives.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another thing that concerns me is the commercialization of every aspect of our lives.
sentences.sCn: 另一件令我担心的事是我们生存的环境中充满了商业化。

sentences.sContent: When experts cite possible harm from the commercialization of laser enrichment, they often point to Iran.
sentences.sContent_eng: When experts cite possible harm from the commercialization of laser enrichment, they often point to Iran.
sentences.sCn: 当专家引证激光浓缩商业化可能带来的危害时，他们经常指向伊朗。

words.tran: 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的
商业主义；营利主义；重商主义
使商品化；靠…赚钱（commercialize的过去分词）
